name: Job
description: The job object describes the name, command line and state of a scheduled job or task.

creation_time.description: The time when the job was created.

file.description: The file that pertains to the job.

last_run_time.description: The time that the job was last run.

next_run_time.description: The time that the job will next be run.

run_state.description: The run state of the job.

run_state_id.description: The run state ID of the job.

user.description: The user that created the job.
